Edges-Background -- Female Anari Human Heroic Itinerant Worker
Attributes (11 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d8 Strength: d10 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes: Giant Blood: May spend a Benny to gain +2 Strength step for 4 rd
Skills (28 Points):
Boating: (agi) d8 Knowledge (Hearthlands): (sma) d8 Shooting: (agi) d6
Climbing: (str) d4 Knowledge (High Winterlands): (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Gambling: (sma) d4 Knowledge (Low Winterlands): (sma) d6 Survival: (sma) d6
Healing: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6-2 Swimming: (agi) d4
Intimidation: (spi) d4 Psionics: (sma) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Investigation: (sma) d4 Riding: (agi) d6 Tracking: (sma) d4
Languages: Anari; Black Tongue; Chalcian; Fingerspeak; Giant
Skill Notes:
Charisma: -2 Persuasion/-2 Streetwise
Mean: -2 Charisma
World-Wise: +5 Skill Points (Knowledge (3+ areas))
Blood Feud: -2 Charisma (rival family)
City Dweller: -2 Common Knowledge (country life)/-2 Stealth (wilderness)/-2 Survival (wilderness)
World-Wise: May attempt unskilled Knowledge (area) rolls
Size: 1 Deity: Eira
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 30 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 12; Edge: 10; Skill: 8
Description Notes:
Diverse: +2 Improvement Points (edge or skills)
Giant Blood: +1 Size
Features
Edges (5 points): Ancestral Guardian; Giant Blood; Large Family; Powerful Family; World-Wise Hindrances: Anemic; Blood Feud; City Dweller; Obese Anari Human Abilities: Diverse
Feature Notes:
Giant Blood: Has Mean feature
Anemic: -2 Fatigue checks (resist poison and disease)
Large Family: +2 Kinship results
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Powerful Family: +2 Kinship results
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 11 (3) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Blessed Armor Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Double Toothpick (d10+d6); Great Axe (d10+d10); Pike (d10+d8); Unarmed (d10+d0)
Combat Notes:
Giant Blood: +1 Toughness
Obese: -1 Pace/-1 Run Step/+1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Great Axe Parry Modifier: -1 Parry when wielded
Arcana
Arcana Notes: Ancestral Guardian: May spend a Benny to cast Aim, Boost Trait, Deflection, Environmental Protection, Farsight, or Warrior's Gift on self
Notes
Validation Warnings: Blessed Armor: Blessed Armor benefits require Arcane Background (Miracles)
